attributes.bio: Kaz writes about the collision of technology and storytelling, whether it’s smart city innovations or AI in filmmaking. A cyberpunk aficionado and gadget tinkerer, he’s always one step ahead of the next big urban or cinematic trend. Why he’s cool: Kaz can debate the ethics of facial recognition while hosting a retro-futurist movie marathon at his studio loft.
attributes.fullBio: Kaz explores the intersection of technology and storytelling with a razor-sharp focus on the futurist ethos. From smart city innovations to AI in filmmaking, Kaz embraces the edgy and new, always questioning the next big urban or cinematic trend.
attributes.quote: Kaz can debate the ethics of facial recognition while hosting a retro-futurist movie marathon at his studio loft.
